channel.title: The Return of the Triple Threat SFoL Class Cards + Info
channel.description:
![free%20candy%20shmurda|690x388](upload://8rGQfR5OBcnPkvFdrfwCAh4x6x8.png)
# Shoutouts to @Kirefitten and @Livicus for helping me with this idiotic idea ## This gamemode is only for sadistic hosts. 24 players.
# To balance out this horrible gamemode, BD classes have recieved various buffs while being nerfed at the same time.
First off, starting King is guaranteed Good and him and Prince are the only classes that are convert immune.
> **Minor Changes:** > Paladin may target self with Blessing of Light > Hidden Blade and Rupture uses will be nerfed to 3 uses. > Non unique class cap is 3 instead of 2. > Good King loses Swear Fealty and gains one extra guard (4 uses) > Mastermind's Foresight is now a Day Ability
[details=Setup] [color=steblue]**Good King**[/color] [color=purple]**Mastermind**[/color] [color=purple]**Assassin**[/color] [color=darkred]**Cult Leader**[/color] [color=darkred]**Random Cultist**[/color] [color=steblue]**Prince**[/color] [color=steblue]**Sheriff**[/color] [color=steblue]**Paladin**[/color] [color=steblue]**Court Wizard**[/color] [color=steblue]**Physician**[/color] [color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Killer**[/color] [color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Offensive**[/color] [color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Investigative**[/color] [color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Social**[/color] **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color] x 10**
**Deputy and Chaplain cannot spawn.** [/details]
## This gamemode also includes The Acolyte I made with @Livicus, Cult Killer. They will be converted from Killer classes instead of turning them into Invokers.
> # [color=darkred]The Acolyte[/color] :crossed_swords: > [color=darkred]**Cult Killer**[/color] > **Spirit of Mithras (Passive)** - Starting with the second use of the Cult Leader's Blood of Mithras, if you would be sacrificed, the first time you will not die. > **Curse of Mithras (Day)** - The player targeted with Cult Leader’s Rupture will die in 1 night instead of 2 nights. - 1 use *Your objective is to defeat the Unseen and Cult*
[details=Acolyte - Dark God's Crown] > Acolyte - Heals will have no affect on target player. [/details]
#### Hunter's Cult alts are unchanged but they will instead convert into an Acolyte.
[details=New Knight Cult Alts] > [color=darkred]**Cult points: 2 - Each ability costs: 1**[/color] [color=darkred]**Cult Alt:**[/color] **(Sacrifice): Corax's Guard (Night)** - Prevent visits to targeted Cultist. - 2 uses **(Cold Steel): Lone Cultist (Night)** - Select someone to kill and commit suicide if you succeed. This attack will bypass heals. (The CL cannot target you for blood of Mithras when you use this) - Infinite uses [/details]
# [color=#1e90ff]M[/color][color=#2980f1]a[/color][color=#3470e3]j[/color][color=#3f60d5]o[/color][color=#4a50c7]r[/color] [color=#5f30aa]C[/color][color=#6a209c]l[/color][color=#75108e]a[/color][color=#800080]s[/color][color=#810072]s[/color] [color=#840055]C[/color][color=#850047]h[/color][color=#860039]a[/color][color=#87002b]n[/color][color=#89001c]g[/color][color=#8a000e]e[/color][color=#8b0000]s[/color]
[details=Prince and Kidnapper] > # [color=steblue]The Prince[/color] :crossed_swords: :shield: > [color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Killer**[/color] **Unstoppable (Passive)** - You cannot be occupied at night, even by means that bypass occupy immunity. You are also immune to target changing. **Royal Blood (Passive)** - You can step up to become the new King earlier than other players. **Imprison (Day)** - Choose a player to jail at night occupying the target (Bypasses occupy immunity) and preventing visits to them. You both will be able to send each other a single 1000 character message through the host. - Infinite uses **Execute (Night)** - Kill the player you have jailed (Bypasses night immunity). If the executed is a member of the Blue Dragon, you will not be able to execute for the rest of the game. - 3 uses, available starting Night 2 *Your objective is to defeat the Unseen and Cult*
> **Converts into [color=purple]The Kidnapper[/color] or [color=darkred]The Acolyte[/color]** > [color=darkred]**Cult points: 1 - Each ability costs: 1** **Cult Alts:**[/color] **(Imprison) - Cell of Mithras** - Choose a player to jail at night occupying the target (Bypasses occupy immunity) and preventing visits to them to everyone except people with a classtype of Support and Special. Their visits will be prevented. You both will be able to send each other a single 1000 character message through the host. - Infinite uses **(Execute) - N/A**
> # [color=purple]The Kidnapper[/color] :shield: > [color=purple]**Unseen Killer**[/color] **Unstoppable (Passive)** - You cannot be occupied at night, even by means that bypass occupy immunity. You are also immune to target changing. **Royal Blood (Passive)** - You can step up to become the new King earlier than other players. **Kidnap (Day)** - Choose a player to jail at night occupying the target (Bypasses occupy immunity) and preventing visits to them. You both will be able to send each other a single 1000 character message through the host. - Infinite uses **Execute (Night)** - Kill the player you have kidnapped (Bypasses night immunity). - 1 use *Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and Cult* [/details]
[details=Sheriff and Marshal] > # [color=steblue]The Sheriff[/color] :crossed_swords: :shield: > [color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Investigative**[/color] **Scout (Day)** - Scout a player. You will know if a member of the Unseen or Cult visit target player. Additionally, you will know which faction visited the player. - Infinite uses **Posse Commitatus (Day)** - If you die tonight, the player you targeted with Expert Investigation tonight will be offered to become a Deputy unless they are convert immune. - Infinite uses **Expert Investigation (Night)** - Check if your target is a member of the Unseen. - Infinite uses **Surveillance (Night)** - Check two targets to see if they are members of the Unseen. - 1 use *Your objective is to defeat the Unseen and Cult*
> **Converts into [color=purple]The Marshal[/color] or [color=darkred]The Seeker[/color]** [color=darkred]**Cult points: 1 - Each ability costs: 1** **Cult Alts:**[/color] **(Scout) Mithras' Scout** - Scout a player. You will learn of the class of any Unseen player who visits them. - Infinite uses **(Posse Commitatus) Retrain** - Change targeted Cultist's class, allowing them to choose new Cult alts from a non-unique class - 1 use **(Expert Investigation) Mithras' Investigation** - Determine a player's class if they are part of the Blue Dragon. - Infinite uses **(Surveillance) Shaded Stalk** - You may find the exact class of two targeted players. - 1 use
> # [color=purple]The Marshal[/color] :shield: > [color=purple]**Unseen Investigative**[/color] **Swift (Passive)** - Can use both Night Abilites in one night. **Expose (Day)** - Reveal the next player to use a day ability to the Unseen. - 3 uses **Probe (Night)** - Determine a player’s class if they are part of the Blue Dragon. - Infinite uses **Interrogate (Night)** - See what feedback all players who targeted that player gets. Works as pre-EFOL notifications. - 2 uses *Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and Cult* [/details]
[details=Paladin and Templar] > # [color=steblue]The Paladin[/color] :crossed_swords: :shield: > [color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Killer**[/color] **Blessing of Light (Day)** - Choose a player, they are immune to conversion attempts to them tonight. - 2 uses **Cleanse (Day)** Your Test of Faith ability will also kill your target if they a Cult member tonight. If they aren’t, this starts a 1 night cooldown and if you die tonight, they will get an offer to become a Chaplain. - Infinite uses **Test of Faith (Night)** - Learn if your target is a member of the Cult. - Infinite uses **Smite (Night)** If anyone attacks you tonight you will kill them (Bypasses night immunity). You will also be immune to conversion tonight. - 1 use *Your objective is to defeat the Unseen and Cult*
> **Converts into [color=purple]The Templar[/color] or [color=darkred]The Acolyte[/color]** [color=darkred]**Cult points: 2 - Each ability costs: 1** **Cult Alts:**[/color] **(Blessing of Light) Blood Red Light** - Target player will be immune to conversion attempts from the Unseen tonight. - 2 uses **(Cleanse) Shade of Corax** - Targeted Cultist will appear as a member of the Blue Dragon to investigations tonight. - 2 uses **(Test of Faith)** - Determine a player's class if they are part of the Unseen. - Infinite uses
> # [color=purple]The Templar[/color] :shield: > [color=purple]**Unseen Killer**[/color] **Holy Will (Day)** - Targeted Unseen member will appear as a member of the Blue Dragon to investigations tonight. - 4 uses **Crusade (Night)** - Find a player's classtype, if targeted player is a Cultist, you will kill them and this ability will go into a 1 night cooldown. - Infinite uses **Deus Vult (Night)** - If anyone attacks you tonight you will kill them (Bypasses night immunity). - 1 use *Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and Cult*
> (Crusade does not bypass night immunity or heals)
[/details]
# [color=#8b0000]N[/color][color=#8b0005]e[/color][color=#8a000a]w[/color] [color=#890014]C[/color][color=#89001a]l[/color][color=#88001f]a[/color][color=#880024]s[/color][color=#870029]s[/color][color=#87002e]e[/color][color=#870033]s[/color] [color=#86003d]([/color][color=#850043]W[/color][color=#850048]e[/color][color=#84004d]a[/color][color=#840052]k[/color][color=#840057]e[/color][color=#83005c]r[/color] [color=#820066]S[/color][color=#82006c]h[/color][color=#810071]e[/color][color=#810076]r[/color][color=#80007b]i[/color][color=#800080]f[/color][color=#7c0685]f[/color] [color=#741290]a[/color][color=#701895]n[/color][color=#6c1e9a]d[/color] [color=#632aa5]P[/color][color=#5f30aa]a[/color][color=#5b36b0]l[/color][color=#573cb5]l[/color][color=#5342ba]y[/color] [color=#4b4ec5]s[/color][color=#4754ca]u[/color][color=#435acf]b[/color][color=#3f60d5]s[/color][color=#3b66da]t[/color][color=#376cdf]i[/color][color=#3272e5]t[/color][color=#2e78ea]u[/color][color=#2a7eef]t[/color][color=#2684f4]e[/color][color=#228afa]s[/color][color=#1e90ff])[/color]
[details=Deputy] > # [color=steblue]The Deputy[/color] > [color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Investigative**[/color] **Scavenge (Day)** - Scout a player. You will know if a member of the Unseen visits target player. - Infinite uses **Expert Investigation (Night)** - Check if your target is a member of the Unseen. - Infinite uses **Mentorship (Night)** - If you die tonight, your target, if a convertable Blue Dragon, will be offered a contract to replace you as the next Deputy. - 1 use *Your objective is to defeat the Unseen and Cult*
> **Converts into [color=purple]The Marshal[/color] or [color=darkred]The Seeker[/color]** [color=darkred]**Cult points: 1 - Each ability costs: 1** **Cult Alts:**[/color] *Same as Sheriff's alts*
[/details]
[details=Chaplain] > # [color=steblue]The Chaplain[/color] > [color=steblue]**Blue Dragon Killer**[/color] **Blessing of Light (Day)** - Choose a player, they are immune to conversion attempts to them tonight. - 1 use **Test Faith (Night)** - Learn if your target is a member of the Cult. - Infinite uses **Tutelage (Night)** - If you die tonight, your target, if a convertable Blue Dragon, will be offered a contract to replace you as the next Chaplain. If they are Cult, you will kill them instead. - 1 use *Your objective is to defeat the Unseen and Cult*
> **Converts into [color=purple]The Templar[/color] or [color=darkred]The Acolyte[/color]** [color=darkred]**Cult points: 1 - Each ability costs: 1** **Cult Alts:**[/color] *Same as Paladin's alts* [/details]

item.title: The Return of the Triple Threat SFoL Class Cards + Info
item.dc:creator: Pug
item.description:
Marcus_Doodalee:

YES THE KIDNAPPER IS BACK

look at this quote for changelogs

Also Acolyte!Prince imprison alt:

Pug:

Cell of Mithras - Choose a player to jail at night occupying the target (Bypasses occupy immunity) and preventing visits to them to everyone except people with a classtype of Support and Special. Their visits will be prevented. You both will be able to send each other a single 1000 character message through the host. - Infinite uses

Read full topic
